What's the rescale factor on the external model (I.E. in the part config)?

They are probably getting set in a different scale on game loading.

[quote name='strykersm']There is no rescale factor.[/QUOTE]

That's your problem, your external model is being scaled 125%, but your internal model is staying the same size.

Hope this helps :)

Solution: Scale up IVA by 125%, or scale up external model 125%, then set rescaleFactor = 1.0

Okay i'l try it when i get back in around 40min and i'l give you an answer.
Just to make sure im doing it right: where do i add the "set rescaleFactor = 1.0"? :D
Simply add "rescaleFactor = 1" to your config, it is common to set that ahead of the node definitions. ;)
